GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: creates and serves a new articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with the provided article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments/decrements an article's votes count and serves the updated article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the provided article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates and then serves a new comment for the provided article id
